ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Druid question
ygData.msgSnippet: Not at all.  Bears should be yellow or black to you at level 10.  Make sure you snare the thing, and if you like you can root kite (root it, then DoT it, then
ygData.messageBody:
Not at all.  Bears should be yellow or black to you at level 10.  Make sure you snare the thing, and if you like you can root kite (root it, then DoT it, then meditate until your root or DoT wears off, and re-cast).  Or you can snare it and run away while blasting it with a DD.  OR snare it, use fear animal, and blast/whack it.  Any of these ways should work well for you.
 
Good luck!
Nymue

----- Original Message -----
From: Jim Fullerton
Sent: Tuesday, May 22, 2001 3:54 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Druid question

Hi, all.  I'm relatively new to the list (been reading it for a month or so, but I've never posted before).

Here's my question:  My lvl 10 Druid is currently in EC and I desperately want to start hunting bears, would this be a bad
thing for a Druid to do?

Hest, lvl 10 Druid on Teris Thule
